## Import the Module
```{python}
import sys; sys.path.insert(0, '..')
from src.preprocess_nc import PreProcessNC
```

## Create an instance
```{python}
analysis = PreProcessNC("NOAAGlobalTemp*.nc")
analysis.subset_time("1980-01-01", "2023-12-31") \
        .deseasonalize() \
        .detrend_linear()
```

## Create subset
```{python}
ds_filtered = analysis.subset_data(year=2010, region_extent=[-100, -85, 35, 45])
ds_filtered.plot_spatial_field
```

## Plot
```{python}
analysis.plot_spatial_field(region_extent = [-10, 40, 35, 70],
title="2003-EU-JJA",
year = 2003,
months = [6,7,8])
```

```{python}
# Plot the weighted time series for the full time period:
analysis.plot_weighted_time_series(region_extent=[-100, -85, 35, 45])
```
